decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 1000 S0 P01 Existing Site Plan; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 1001 S0 P04 Proposed Site Plan; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 4000 S0 P01 Existing Elevations 1 and 2; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 4001 S0 P01 Existing Elevations 3 and 4; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 4100 S0 P07 Proposed Elevations 1 and 2; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 4101 S0 P07 Proposed Elevations 3 and 4; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 3000 S0 P01 Existing Floor Plans; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 3000 S0 P07 Proposed Floor Plans; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 5000 S0 P01 Existing Sections; 23065 CBP Z1 XX DR A 5100 S0 P06 Proposed Sections,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement roof with alterations to roof profile and ridge height raised, extension to both side roof slopes including higher eaves;  single storey side extension (Following demolition of existing single storey side)
